00030 /**
00031  * Flexform iterator class
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Flexform_Iterator implements Iterator
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * SimpleXMLElement with the data from the flexform
00042      */
00043     protected $_flexData      = NULL;
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * Shortcut for the flexform fields
00047      */
00048     protected $_fields        = NULL;
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * Default ID for the flexform sheet section, for the __get method
00052      */
00053     protected $_sheet         = 'sDEF';
00054     
00055     /**
00056      * Default ID for the flexform language section, for the __get method
00057      */
00058     protected $_lang          = 'lDEF';
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * Default ID for the flexform value section, for the __get method
00062      */
00063     protected $_value         = 'vDEF';
00064     
00065     /**
00066      * Current position for the iterator methods
00067      */
00068     protected $_iteratorIndex = 0;
00069     
00070     /**
00071      * Current instance is for a flexform section
00072      */
00073     protected $_subObject     = false;
00074     
00075     /**
00076      * The items type for a flexform section
00077      */
00078     protected $_itemType      = '';
00079     
00080     /**
00081      * Class constructor
00082      * 
00083      * @param   string  The flexform XML data
00084      * @return  NULL
00085      */
00086     public function __construct( &$xmlData, $itemType = '' )
00087     {
00088         // Checks if the passed data is already a SimpleXML object
00089         if( is_object( $xmlData ) ) {
00090             
00091             $this->_flexData  =& $xmlData;
00092             $this->_fields    =& $xmlData;
00093             $this->_itemType  = $itemType;
00094             $this->_subObject = true;
00095             
00096         } else {
00097             
00098             // Creates a SImpleXMLElement with the flexform data
00099             try {
00100                 
00101                 // Create the object
00102                 $this->_flexData = new SimpleXMLElement( $xmlData );
00103                 
00104                 // DEBUG ONLY - Shows the flexform structure
00105                 #print_r( $this->_flexData );
00106                 
00107                 // Gets the fields shortcuts
00108                 $this->_getFieldsShortcut();
00109                 
00110             } catch( Exception $e ) {
00111                 
00112                 // Cannot parse the flexform
00113                 throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Iterator_Exception(
00114                     $e->getMessage(),
00115                     tx_oop_Flexform_Iterator_Exception::EXCEPTION_BAD_XML
00116                 );
00117             }
00118         }
00119     }
00120     
00121     /**
00122      * PHP getter method
00123      * 
00124      * This methods gets the value of a flexform field, as if it was a property
00125      * of this class.
00126      * 
00127      * @param   string  The name of the flexform field
00128      * @return  string  The field value
00129      */
00130     public function __get( $fieldName )
00131     {
00132         return $this->getFieldValue(
00133             $fieldName,
00134             $this->_sheet,
00135             $this->_lang,
00136             $this->_value
00137         );
00138     }
00139     
00140     
00141     /**
00142      * PHP toString method
00143      * 
00144      * @return  string  A blank string or the item type, if used in a flexform section
00145      */
00146     public function __toString()
00147     {
00148         return $this->_itemType;
00149     }
00150     
00151     /**
00152      * Move position to the first element (Iterator method)
00153      * 
00154      * @return  NULL
00155      */
00156     public function rewind()
00157     {
00158         $this->_iteratorIndex = 0;
00159     }
00160     
00161     /**
00162      * Get current element (Iterator method)
00163      * 
00164      * @return  SimpleXML   The current XML object
00165      */
00166     public function current()
00167     {
00168         // Tries to get the value
00169         if( $value = $this->_fields->field[ $this->_iteratorIndex ]->xpath( 'value[@index="' . $this->_value . '"]' ) ) {
00170             
00171             // Returns the value
00172             return ( string )array_shift( $value );
00173         }
00174         
00175         // Checks for a flexform section
00176         if( isset( $this->_fields->field[ $this->_iteratorIndex ]->el->section ) ) {
00177             
00178             // Storage for elements
00179             $section = array();
00180             
00181             // Process each element in the section
00182             foreach( $this->_fields->field[ $this->_iteratorIndex ]->el->section as $nodeName => $nodeValue ) {
00183                 
00184                 // Gets the item type
00185                 $itemType = ( string )$nodeValue->itemType[ 'index' ];
00186                 
00187                 // Adds the sub-object
00188                 $section[] = new self( $nodeValue->itemType->el, $itemType );
00189             }
00190             
00191             // Return the section
00192             return $section;
00193         }
00194         
00195         // No such value
00196         return false;
00197     }
00198     
00199     /**
00200      * Get current element's key (Iterator method)
00201      * 
00202      * @return  int The name of the current XML tag
00203      */
00204     public function key()
00205     {
00206         $currentField = $this->_fields->field[ $this->_iteratorIndex ];
00207         return ( string )$currentField[ 'index' ];
00208     }
00209     
00210     /**
00211      * Move position to the next element (Iterator method)
00212      * 
00213      * @return  NULL
00214      */
00215     public function next()
00216     {
00217         $this->_iteratorIndex++;
00218     }
00219     
00220     /**
00221      * Checks current element (Iterator method)
00222      * 
00223      * @return  boolean
00224      */
00225     public function valid()
00226     {
00227         return is_object( $this->_fields ) && isset( $this->_fields->field[ $this->_iteratorIndex ] );
00228     }
00229     
00230     /**
00231      * Gets a shorctut to the fields object
00232      * 
00233      * @return  boolean
00234      */
00235     protected function _getFieldsShortcut()
00236     {
00237         // Creates the XPath expression
00238         $xPath = '/T3FlexForms/data/sheet[@index="'
00239                . $this->_sheet
00240                . '"]/language[@index="'
00241                . $this->_lang
00242                . '"]';
00243         
00244         // Tries to get fields
00245         if( $fields = $this->_flexData->xpath( $xPath ) ) {
00246             
00247             // Stores the fields
00248             $this->_fields = array_shift( $fields );
00249             return true;
00250         }
00251         
00252         // No fields
00253         $this->_fields = NULL;
00254         return false;
00255     }
00256     
00257     /**
00258      * Gets the value of a flexform field
00259      * 
00260      * @param   string  The name of the flexform field
00261      * @param   string  The ID of the flexform sheet (default is sDEF) 
00262      * @param   string  The ID of the language (default is lDEF)
00263      * @param   string  The ID of the value (default is vDEF)
00264      * @return  string  The value of the flexform field
00265      */
00266     public function getFieldValue( $fieldName, $sheet = 'sDEF', $lang = 'lDEF', $value = 'vDEF' )
00267     {
00268         // Checks if the current instance is a sub-object
00269         if( $this->_subObject ) {
00270             
00271             // XPath expression for the field value
00272             $xPath = 'field[@index="' . $fieldName . '"]/value';
00273             
00274             // Tries to get the value
00275             if( $value = $this->_flexData->xpath( $xPath ) ) {
00276                 
00277                 // Returns the value
00278                 return ( string )array_shift( $value );
00279             }
00280             
00281             // No such field
00282             return false;
00283         }
00284         
00285         // Creates the XPath expression for a value field
00286         $valueXpath = '/T3FlexForms/data/sheet[@index="'
00287                . $sheet
00288                . '"]/language[@index="'
00289                . $lang
00290                . '"]/field[@index="'
00291                . $fieldName
00292                . '"]/value[@index="'
00293                . $value
00294                . '"]';
00295         
00296         // Creates the XPath expression for a section field
00297         $sectionXpath = '/T3FlexForms/data/sheet[@index="'
00298                . $sheet
00299                . '"]/language[@index="'
00300                . $lang
00301                . '"]/field[@index="'
00302                . $fieldName
00303                . '"]/el/section';
00304         
00305         // Tries to get the field value
00306         if( $value = $this->_flexData->xpath( $valueXpath ) ) {
00307             
00308             // Returns the value
00309             return ( string )array_shift( $value );
00310         }
00311         
00312         // Checks for a flexform section
00313         if( $section = $this->_flexData->xpath( $sectionXpath ) ) {
00314             
00315             // Storage for elements
00316             $section = array();
00317             
00318             // Process each element in the section
00319             foreach( $this->_fields->field[ $this->_iteratorIndex ]->el->section as $nodeName => $nodeValue ) {
00320                 
00321                 // Gets the item type
00322                 $itemType = ( string )$nodeValue->itemType[ 'index' ];
00323                 
00324                 // Adds the sub-object
00325                 $section[] = new self( $nodeValue->itemType->el, $itemType );
00326             }
00327             
00328             // Return the section
00329             return $section;
00330         }
00331         
00332         // No such field
00333         return false;
00334     }
00335     
00336     /**
00337      * Sets the default flexform sheet ID
00338      * 
00339      * @param   string  The ID of the sheet
00340      * @return  boolean
00341      */
00342     public function setDefaultSheet( $id )
00343     {
00344         // Not available for sections sub-objects
00345         if( $this->_subObject ) {
00346             
00347             return false;
00348         }
00349         
00350         // Sets the sheet ID
00351         $this->_sheet = ( string )$id;
00352         
00353         // Relink the fields shortcut
00354         $this->_getFieldsShortcut();
00355         
00356         return true;
00357     }
00358     
00359     /**
00360      * Sets the default flexform lang ID
00361      * 
00362      * @param   string  The ID of the lang
00363      * @return  boolean
00364      */
00365     public function setDefaultLang( $id )
00366     {
00367         // Not available for sections sub-objects
00368         if( $this->_subObject ) {
00369             
00370             return false;
00371         }
00372         
00373         // Sets the lang ID
00374         $this->_lang = ( string )$id;
00375         
00376         // Relink the fields shortcut
00377         $this->_getFieldsShortcut();
00378         return true;
00379     }
00380     
00381     /**
00382      * Sets the default flexform value ID
00383      * 
00384      * @param   string  The ID of the value
00385      * @return  boolean
00386      */
00387     public function setDefaultValue( $id )
00388     {
00389         // Not available for sections sub-objects
00390         if( $this->_subObject ) {
00391             
00392             return false;
00393         }
00394         
00395         // Sets the value ID
00396         $this->_value = ( string )$id;
00397         return true;
00398     }
00399 }
